articles.description: Dr. Donald Yealy said there's less chance of getting it from someone who doesn't know they are sick than of having an accident on the turnpike.
articles.content:
Fewer people are testing positive for COVID-19 and those who test positive dont seem to be getting as sick, a UPMC doctor said Thursday.
